originalText.text: I manage a small office of people here in Manhattan and we were looking for a great group outing to go on last month. We found the Coach Bus Charter online and realized they had tours all over the city. I know it seems a little tacky but it was so much fun and the entire team rallied together had an absolute blast. I highly recommend this wonderful rental company to anybody here in New York or who is visiting for the day.

originalText.text: Happy to recommend these guys to anybody who lives in New York or is visiting for fun. If you want to rent a Coach Bus for a really cheap price they are absolutely the best. We got a bus for me and my husband and my two kids and all our friends and everybody was super satisfied.

originalText.text: I'm very happy to report that the Coach Bus Charter we got from this crew was just the best. So nice and so easy to deal with them as well. Very very knowledgeable people who clearly just love this city. They gave us a great price and we had a great time seeing a little bit more Manhattan.

Very very knowledgeable people who clearly just love this city. They gave us a great price and we had a great time seeing a little bit more Manhattan.

originalText.text: If you have kids and live here in New York you know how hard it can be sometimes to find something different for them to do. There's plenty of things in the city but a lot of them aren't super kid-friendly. Luckily renting a bus and driving around the city is the perfect family activity. We found this Coach Bus Charter through a friend who also does the same thing with their kids and it is now definitely going to be part of our routine.

originalText.text: Bus rental is a simple thing when you work with a good company. They were easy to work with and everything went.  The bus breathing and the staff was great. I recommend their services.
